name: AllentownPoliceBlotter
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill provides the up-to-date police reports for the city of Allentown, Pennsylvania. The RSS feed is provided by the Morning Call newspaper.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
